news_header: Meta, the owner of Facebook, plans to construct 50,000 kilometers of underwater cable globally, which will be the longest in the world. This project, announced on February 14, aims to expand Meta's influence beyond social media into areas like artificial intelligence and infrastructure.
news_original_title: Meta aikoo rakentaa maailman pisimmän merenalaisen nettikaapelin
news_text: The cable will connect multiple continents and is expected to cost billions, with safety measures being considered for its construction.
